title: Down the Rabbit Hole
description: You're late for a very important date...Enter a wonderland of mesmerizing tales. It's a place that's neither here nor there, where things are never quite as they seem. Inspired by Lewis Carroll's whimsical masterpiece, ranging from the impossible to the mad to the curiouser, these stories will have you absolutely off your head.Don't be afraid to follow themâ€¦DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE"Wonderment in Death" by J. D. Robb"Alice and the Earl in Wonderland" by Mary Blayney"iLove" by Elaine Fox"A True Heart" by Mary Kay McComas"Fallen" by R. C. Ryan
author: J.D. Robb
